A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Do yourself a favor: watch it twice. The first time\, you’ll feel confused - maybe even disappointed that the Star Wars story arcs you love are going in a completely different direction. Take a deep breath\, calm yourself and take two quotes from The Last Jedi to heart: “Let the past die.” - Kylo Ren “This is not going to go the way you think.” - Luke Skywalker The second time around\, I promise you’ll appreciate The Last Jedi on its own. Yes\, there are a few missteps (e.g. the length\, and Finn/Rose’s side adventure). But as a whole\, The Last Jedi makes an emotional transition from the original trilogy into the new one.
